DOC.detailed_description: This single site , prospective , non-blinded , non-randomized , non-interventional study design evaluate hemodynamic cardiovascular effect steep Trendelenburg position non-invasive minimally invasive monitor use operating room surgical procedure require patient position . SPECIFIC AIMS : 1 ) Observe hemodynamic cardiovascular change associate change supine steep Trendelenburg position . 2 ) Observe hemodynamic cardiovascular change intra-abdominal insufflation use laparoscopic surgical procedure . HYPOTHESIS : Hemodynamic cardiovascular change alteration position supine steep Trendelenburg intra-abdominal insufflation measure non-invasive minimally invasive monitor correlate transthoracic echocardiographic measurement .
DOC.criteria: Scheduled elective surgery require steep trendelenburg positioning . BMI > 30 . < 18 year . Pregnancy . Prisoners .
